official_title: A Phase 2 Multicenter, Open-Label, Uncontrolled Study to Evaluate the Safety, Tolerability, Efficacy, Pharmacokinetics, and Pharmacodynamics of RA101495 in Subjects With Paroxysmal Nocturnal Hemoglobinuria Who Have an Inadequate Response to Eculizumab
inclusion_criteria:
* Diagnosis of PNH by flow cytometry
* Inadequate response to eculizumab defined as having received eculizumab for at least 6 months plus a documented LDH level â‰¥ 1.5 x the upper limit of normal (ULN) and/or the presence of a known C5 mutation conferring resistance to eculizumab
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must have minimum age of 18 Years
exclusion_criteria:
* History of meningococcal disease
* Current systemic infection or suspicion of active bacterial infection
